Uses of Interface
hesml.taxonomy.IHalfEdge

  • Packages that use IHalfEdge 
    Package Description
    hesml.taxonomy  
    hesml.taxonomy.impl  

    • Uses of IHalfEdge in hesml.taxonomy

      Methods in hesml.taxonomy that return IHalfEdge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IHalfEdge IEdge.getDirect() 
      IHalfEdge IVertex.getFirstOutcomingEdge()
      This function returns the first outcoming oriented edge as defined in the HESML paper.
      IHalfEdge IVertex.getIncidentEdge(IVertex target)
      This function returns the oriented outcoming edge pointing to the input vertex.
      IHalfEdge IEdge.getInverse() 
      IHalfEdge IHalfEdge.getNext()
      This function returns the next outcoming edges from the target vertex.
      IHalfEdge IHalfEdge.getOpposite()
      This functions returns the opposite paired oriented-edge.

    • Uses of IHalfEdge in hesml.taxonomy.impl

      Classes in hesml.taxonomy.impl that implement IHalfEdge 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  HalfEdge
      This class implements a non-oriented edge as defined by the IHalfEdge interface.
      Fields in hesml.taxonomy.impl declared as IHalfEdge 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private IHalfEdge Vertex.m_FirstOutArc
      First half edge outcoming from the vertex.
      private IHalfEdge HalfEdge.m_NextEdge
      The next outcoming edge from the target vertex
      private IHalfEdge HalfEdge.m_OppositeEdge
      Opposite edge
      Methods in hesml.taxonomy.impl that return IHalfEdge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IHalfEdge Edge.getDirect()
      This function returns the direct oriented edge.
      IHalfEdge Vertex.getFirstOutcomingEdge()
      This function returns the first outcoming oriented edge from the vertex.
      IHalfEdge Vertex.getIncidentEdge(IVertex target)
      This function returns the oriented edge pointing to the input vertex or null if there is no any linking edge.
      IHalfEdge Edge.getInverse()
      This function returns the inverse oriented edge.
      private IHalfEdge Vertex.getLastOutcomingArc()
      This function returns the last outcoming oriented edge from the vertex.
      IHalfEdge HalfEdge.getNext()
      This function returns the next outcoming edge from the target vertex.
      IHalfEdge HalfEdge.getOpposite()
      This function returns the paired and opposite oriented edge.
      Methods in hesml.taxonomy.impl with parameters of type IHalfEdge 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void Vertex.setFirstOutEdge(IHalfEdge outArc)
      This function sets the first outcoming oriented edge for the current vertex.
      (package private) void HalfEdge.setNext(IHalfEdge next)
      This function sets the next outcoming edge from the target vertex.
      (package private) void HalfEdge.setOpposite(IHalfEdge opposite)
      This function sets the opposite edge, and it is only invoked by the owner non-oriented edge in order to connect both paired half-edges.
